title: Little.Shop.of.Horrors.(1986).Original.Pre-Theatrical.Ending.Dra
description: This is a first attempt at restoring the original ending to Little Shop of Horrors (1986) that was filmed but never released in theaters.  It is the theatrical version with the last 20 or so minutes removed and replaced with a black and white copy of the original ending.  The original ending was released on a Disc 2 of the DVD but then quickly recalled by the producers; however, you can still find it on the net.  The sound is imperfect and the transitions between the theatrical and the original are imperfect.  So if you think you can do a better job at it, go for it.  Sorry no subs.
